website_summaries.verdict: This pantry is ideal for those short on space. Though slim, it offers plenty of space hidden behind recessed panel doors.
pros: Constructed from a mix of hardwood solids and engineered wood, this is a sturdy, well-made choice
Features two adjustable shelves for customizing the storage space
cons: A small amount of faulty pantries have issues with the hinges

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in excellent condition. They package every single piece separately and even all of the screws. Also, they label every piece with letters and screws with names. They do provide easy to read instructions. So assembling this was really easy. Some of the pieces were heavy but I was so excited to finish and see the end result that it didn't bother me. I put it in my guest room to store stationary items and books.
customer_reviews.author: DazzyGlam

customer_reviews.title: Damaged at the manufacturers.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet arrived undamaged by shipping but defective because the manufacturer split one of the doors while screwing on the hinge. I have glued it but I don't think it will last and it looks bad. The cabinet is much to heavy for me to pack it up again and ship it back. I don't know what to do. I am very disappointed in it. It cost $410 so it is an expensive problem. When spending that much on something I don't expect it to come with such a serious problem. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Fagerson

customer_reviews.title: Beware-- This "White" is almost beige
customer_reviews.text: Handsome style and a reasonably sturdy construction for the price. I like that it is made in Thailand as opposed to China. I believe the main pieces are rubberwood, or a similar species of real wood. Much heavier, sturdier feel than particle board. Assembly wasn't too difficult, but these pieces are heavy; I'd consider it a 2 person job. The color is my only--big--disappointment. This "White" is not white. It's not even "off white." It's a dingy cream that looks closer to a matte beige than to white. If you're looking to harmonize with white woodwork or a white kitchen, look elsewhere. Otherwise, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: 16th Floor

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, packaged extremely well. Arrived with the box damaged on the outside and no damage to the product. Instructions were a little confusing but overall not too bad. I bought it because most of the reviews said it was sturdy. I have no idea what they were talking about because it feels flimsy and cheap. I shouldn't have spent the amount of money on it that I did because it was all cheap particle board. Also the way the pieces connect are by a tiny camscrew screwed into particleboard. Doesnt seem like it will last more than a few months. Walmart quality with Hobby Lobby prices.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Beautiful and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my laundry room when I remodeled it and got a new front loader washer and dryer. Looked EVERYWHERE for sturdy cabinets that didn't cost a fortune but weren't all particle board either. This is just PERFECT! I've received tons of compliments on this cabinet and my best friend actually went online and bought herself one when she saw it. Took a few hours to put together. Each piece was carefully packaged, no parts damaged or lost. Instructions are well written and easy to follow and they actually give you EXTRA parts for everything so you don't come up missing a screw. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: LDYJMH

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cabinet, although expensive
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cabinet, although expensive. Not all of the doors‘ hinges were installed the same (1/4 inch off, no kidding) at the factory, so two of the four doors would not close. Emailing customer service for warranty, they did send replacement pieces. Well a nice looking cabinet, it must also be noted that not all of the pieces are the same shade of white. They do not match. This appears to be a quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a white cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the directions to assemble were good. I think it takes two people. Storage is adequate. The color is off white, like a gray or tan white. Our bathroom trim is a true white, so we had to paint the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: P.Badger

customer_reviews.title: Challenging construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cabinet for bathroom storage. The pieces are very sturdy and heavy. Pieces were labeled well so I knew where each piece went. Putting the back panels together were tough because I was juggling so many parts so it is best to do with two people. I don’t know if I did something wrong but I could not get it to be stable, it was loose and wobbly so I had to screw it to the wall. Looks classy
customer_reviews.author: Jain

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking pantry
customer_reviews.text: Very well packed when arrived, if you follow all instructions and dont get in a hurry it will turn out very nice. We are very pleased with this pantry it could be bigger but then would be hard to manage. I give it an 8 out of 10 for looks. I am a fussy person so that is a good rating! I would order another if I need more space in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Grad

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: I love this caninet. It looks just like the picture, although a little smaller than I expected. It’s sturdy, well designed and goes together easily. My only complaint is with the color. It is antique white instead of bright white like it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but marking stickers leave residue
customer_reviews.text: I am overall happy with the quality and the sturdiness of this cabinet it’s very beautiful. Only drawback i have is the marking stickers on each piece of wood did not come off all the way and left a residue. I used a product called goo gone to remove the film of each sticker which took me as long as building . It’s a great product id buy it again but the company needs to find a better way to mark the pieces of wood. So for people who are buying this do yourself a favor and add goo gone to your cart with this order it will help out big time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pantry is absolutely beautiful and matches my kitchen island perfectly i love it so much and would definitely suggest it. Im a big fan of real wood and this thing is extremely sturdy and i will probably have it for the rest of my life i love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: helendb

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful pantry!
customer_reviews.text: My brother-in-law put this together for me in a little over an hour. I already had it unpacked and laid out when he came over. He put it together and my sister helped him place it where I wanted it. She stored my groceries and snacks in it for me. I love it!! It is a beautiful piece of furniture!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Not Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Pleasantly surprised by the quality of the wood. Very sturdy and doesn't wobble on tile floor. We painted ours to match our cabinets due to availability of color choices. Very easy instructions for putting together. Will primarily be used for food storage. Not worried about weight of cans or heavier objects at all. Would definitely recommend. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Very decorative, not just a cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Boxes was very heavy and well packaged. I ordered two and both were in perfect condition when unpacked. Moderately easy to put together and very surprised at the sturdiness of the cabinets. Back pieces are not that cardboard and mini nail situation, It has two thicker pieces of with with a center support and screws for the back. Once I add my own decorative knobs, I am completely happy with the cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty and has great space.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks. What I don’t like are the magnets, they are too strong and loud when you close. Also the whole cabinet seems to lean back so it looks a little crooked.
customer_reviews.author: quads

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this pantry for a few months. It was easy to assemble and it holds a lot of items. I needed it for additional food storage since the cabinet space in my kitchen is limited. I can finally buy extra food and not have to worry about where I am going to put it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Did everything I needed it to.
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet was delivered quickly, in excellent condition, and with everything needed to put it together. Assembly took a moderate level of skill and went very quickly. The finished product is heavy, sturdy, and an attractive addition to our kitchen. I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the look and it seem very well made. It was easy to assemble. I recommend it if you need added storage with eye appeal.
customer_reviews.author: Nyurdreams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pantry cabinet; it's a little smaller than I expected but is very nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this item for additional storage in my kitchen. Very sturdy, excellent quality. Easy to assemble although it's helpful to have another person lift and move this during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Babs2014

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, sturdy,  easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: All parts are very well labeled and instructions are clear. It Is time consuming, but when completed its very sturdy and attractive. The only suggestion I would make is that they put magnetic catches at the bottoms of the doors also. A second person to help is recommended. It is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, undamaged, extremely well packed. As others said, the doors did not match up well. We tinkered with them awhile and they still do not match up. It's not too serious, I know it's fixable, but we need to work on it more which is annoying. Other than that, I do like the cabinet. It's a nice size, looks solid and is pretty. Fits my rectangular electric skillet, rectangular bread maker, blender...stuff I don't use often but don't want to trek to the basement to get.
customer_reviews.author: Rather Be Writing

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I think maybe some steps on the directions could be different in order to help one person put it together. It is a great cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany E.

customer_reviews.title: Home style pantry worked out well for us
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly next to my built in cabinets and I replaced the knobs with the ones on my cabinets and it looks good. The white color is a little off, but barely noticeable. I actually also bought an island from the same company that matches the pantry, which makes it look even more like a match. So I'd say I'm as pleased as you can be, since I probably saved $20,000 she nice my other option was to purchase all new cabinets
customer_reviews.author: Maco

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Came delivered as I set up. The delivery was later than I scheduled but I think that was on the delivery company’s part. The product was easy to assemble and I felt like good quality for the money. There were extra parts but I think that’s normal. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Follow step by step instructions and secure the back as directed
customer_reviews.text: Real wood and absolutely beautiful, note follow the instructions and it’s straight forward. Great quality and value. Much better that others out there would buy again and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cory jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pantry, It came with good packaging with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Pantry, It came with good packaging with no damage. It required about 2hrs of assembly. Instructions were adequate.. For the price the pantry is good, but perhaps not as sturdy as other furniture pieces you buy from a furniture store.. The joints wobble very slightly although I made sure the screws were tight, and it was level on the floor! Would I buy another one of these? Yes at this price I couldn't find anything as beautiful as this one.
customer_reviews.author: PZ

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet. I bought it for a pantry for my kitchen. Very well made, nice piece of furniture. It wasn't hard to put together either. The top of the cabinet is flat so things can be added on top of it if you'd like. Really love this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We needed a little extra storage in our kitchen. Its looks great and is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute cabinet! We are using it in our corporate kitchenette as the pantry for our k-K-Cup boxes and other supplies. We used magnetic child locks to keep it locked, but it's the perfect size. For the price, this looks very high quality. I would definitely recommend it! My note is that we had a professional assemble it, so I cannot attest to how easy or hard that was.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: sturdy piece. Easy to assemble though it would have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, sturdy piece. Easy to assemble though it would have helped to have an extra person. (I am a 5'3" woman) and it took me about 3 hours - though I had to carry everything up two flights of stairs too. The Cherry is a little lighter than I expected and than the picture online but still a very attractive piece of furniture. I was very concerned that it would be wobbly until I finished attaching the back with the screws. All of the play went away. There is plenty of room inside and I love this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Deb D

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Live in an apt. without enough cupboard space. I've had this for over a year now and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie I expected cheap quality. This fits great in my kitchen and it’s beautiful. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice cabinet but do not be fooled it’s not a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cabinet but do not be fooled it’s not a true white color. It’s an off white/antique white color. I was looking for white! It also comes in a huge box that showed up completely destroyed and tapped back up several times. Extremely poor packaging (have pictures as proof).
customer_reviews.author: Crizzy2020

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good quality. I use it in my bathroom. Lots of storage. It’s not a white white color, a little off white.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Many problems with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: During the assembly of the pantry, I noticed the base was not manufactured correctly and a there was a scrape on a side panel. So I emailed the address given for the service department and included pictures but the email was rejected stating, "there is no one at this address". Then I called the 1-888 number and can only get voicemail. I hope I receive help soon. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: SOLID HARDWOOD
customer_reviews.text: I never leave product reviews but in this case i had to. This is abit expensive for assembly furniture but i have to say its worth it. All the pieces seem to be solid wood and not particle board. Intructions are easy to follow also. I would definantly buy again after seeing the hardwood contruction.
customer_reviews.author: Ken. E.

customer_reviews.title: A quality cabinet, worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier, this cabinet met all our needs, and it looks fantastic...
customer_reviews.author: Rod Klomp

customer_reviews.title: White is now grey?
customer_reviews.text: Well, I liked everything about this product apart from the fact that the cabinet is grey, not white. It’s nice, and the exactly color match would have been appreciated, but it’s NOT white
customer_reviews.author: MStep

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this cabinet! I had searched for a cabinet to use in my kitchen as a pantry. I wanted something pretty that would also hold several items. I was hesitant to order on line but so glad I did. My daughter and I were able to put the cabinet together. It is very sturdy, looks great and is just what I had been searching for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pantry
customer_reviews.text: The bottom door alignment are a teeny bit off, but otherwise instructions, hardware, and pieces all fit and were easy to understand and put together. No 4 letter words yelled here! Looks great and has more space than i thought it would. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cabinet. I purchased it to store my craft material. The directions were very easy to follow. We put it together in less than an hour. I am contemplating purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and sturdy panyry
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my cart for ~ 6 months debating and when the price dropped, I bit the bullet. I am so glad. This is so nice looking and surprisingly sturdy. Very easy to put together compared to other pieces we have had to assemble. Would recommend to friends in a heart beat. While this one is perfect for the spot I placed it, I do wish they made a wider one as well. I would like it doubled in width.
customer_reviews.author: CB "Mom of 2"

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on this product, finally ordered one. Was very impressed with how the package was packed for shipping. Even though both my hubby and I are very mechanical it did take us a couple of hours to put it together. So very pleased with the quality and paint color (it is a shade of white, not white white) that we bought a second one. It was also delivered in the same rugged packaging and because we learned on the first one, it only took about 45 minutes to put the second one together.
customer_reviews.author: J Z

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Much slimmer than expected. It is actually around 28in wide. With that said it is great storage and really sturdy. Must strap to wall. We screwed the unit into our wall.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L C

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and sturdy, there's still a heavy but laminated plastic feel. I was expecting it a little more handmade wood type feeling based on the price but that could be my own expectations. All and all it seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: Not really 30" wide
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my laundry room. My cabinets, assembled are 29 1/4" wide, and that is at the top and bottom. The actual outside storage space measurement is 26" wide. I would not call it a solid piece of furniture when assembled. Until it is bolted to the wall it will sway back and forth when the doors are opened. Follow instructions carefully when assembling.
customer_reviews.author: J MacD

customer_reviews.title: Matches the existing furniture nicely and is good enough quality for what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for a china closet in our formal dining room. Matches the existing furniture nicely and is good enough quality for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy. I must say that I am very impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy. I must say that I am very impressed with this pantry. I was worried based on some of the other reviews but I am so glad I purchased the unit. I like it so much I purchased a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet! Using it to add storage space in my bathroom and I couldn't be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This pantry was SO MUCH better than we expected. It is HEAVY and very well made. Assembly was a snap and we are loving it! I highly recommend it and it looks great!!! It looks like a very expensive pantry. We were worried we might end up with a cheapie because we weren't spending $700. NOT AT ALL THE CASE. WE are VERY happy with this purchase and will buy more from the company. DURABLE, STURDY, EASY TO ASSEMBLE and shipped FAST!!
customer_reviews.author: George foreman

customer_reviews.title: Great pantry for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend for a assemble at home pantry. Assembly took us around 4 hours. Able to store goods we cannot fit in our cabinets. Does the job for us. The off white shade works for us
customer_reviews.author: Lesley J. Poblete-Creech

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this pantry.
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen had absolutely no food storage area in it. While it is smaller than I hoped for, it is meeting my needs. As like other reviews, the door magnets don't line up well but a rubber band holds the doors closed. We abandoned the directions and assembled the cabinet on the base, finding it was much simpler to do it that way. Am pleased with the look, fits the small area assigned to it, and hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: James McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Exceed my expectation!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy wood, and functional cabinet. Very satisfy. Much better quality than IKEA cabinet. Just wish it can be couple inches taller to fit in another row.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that some people had trouble with assembling this item. Mine went together without any issues and the doors lined up perfectly. It's a great addition to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Judith H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kitchen Pantry
customer_reviews.text: This product was packaged efficiently and securely, no scratches or marks of any kind. It was fairly easy to put together and I did this by myself. The only tricky part was putting the second box on top of the lower box. That would have been easy with a second person. The finish on the pantry is a nice off white, not bright white. And, it holds everything I needed it for in the kitchen, plus some extra space. I would buy this again as well as other products from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat P.

customer_reviews.title: quality piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: the color was a little lighter than the pic shows but still a nice piece
customer_reviews.author: mona k.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful cabinet/matches cabinetry perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet maker wanted over $2000. to MAKE this cabinet, I got it here for $617. This is custom cabinet quality well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Love this pantry
customer_reviews.text: Love this pantry! We have a small apartment and it was just perfect to store extra towels and paper goods on the top section and dry goods on the bottom. Really helped to make some space in our kitchen cabinets. Looks very nice too and very easy to assemble. You will probably need 2 people to assemble however due to having to put the top piece on while the unit is standing upright. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: shenry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cabinet, not too bad to put together, and it's sturdy with lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle King

customer_reviews.title: Apperance
customer_reviews.text: Great looking storage unit, very sturdy, looks great in our dining area..using it for overflow of larger small kitchen appliances. Husband assembled unit in a couple of hours... thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ray R.

customer_reviews.title: It feels solid and sturdy! Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by the quality of this product and the ease of putting it together!! I have put a lot of furniture together and this is one of the easiest! It feels solid and sturdy! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: osugrl23

customer_reviews.title: 😥
customer_reviews.text: Way to many parts!! When you put one side together the other one would fall not very feasible !😥
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Packaged very well, arrived without a scratch. Was able to put it together pretty easily with a little help from my son. The finish on it is very nice, more of an antique white not a bright white. It looks and feels high quality. Great addition to my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Get what  you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a product that demonstrates you get what you pay for. It's a really fine, sturdy piece and very prett piece to have in your kitchen. Its not made cheap nor is it particle board. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bar Obby

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Looks as pictured. Very nice and reasonably sturdy. I put it together by myself, was not real complicated. An extra person helping would have mad it easier while putting it together. I am very happy with the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good pantry
customer_reviews.text: please note the doors will not align if the pantry is not leveled properly ... leveling can be done using the height adjustments and the bottom of each corners I had to play with these adjustments but my doors did finally aligned ... now it's great
customer_reviews.author: nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect extra storage for kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This pantry is exactly what i was looking for to put in my kitchen! It's attractive and functional.I've had many compliments on it. I put it together myself, only needing help putting the top on and moving it into place. It arrived 3 days after i ordered it in perfect condition. Be prepared for a lot of packaging to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Harper

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! Good quality for the money spent. Follow the directions and putting it together will go very smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Maurice A. Fiocca

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cabinet and holds so much. It looks great and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rahn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to my kitchen for storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my kitchen for storage. Arrived in perfect condition, had no issues putting together.
customer_reviews.author: LJR322

customer_reviews.title: It looks good & holds a lot of items
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitchen. It looks good & holds a lot of items. I store baking items which can be odd shaped, and a bread basket. I recommend if your looking for a good storage cabinet
customer_reviews.author: mamazita

customer_reviews.title: Not bright white
customer_reviews.text: The pantry is not bright white but it was a muted off-white which I love. Fit the space perfectly Had minor trouble assembling but it eventually came together.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy assembly! I ordered this thinking that it would come in a million pieces and would take forever to assemble. I was wrong! The top and base are already assembled, so you you mainly have to assemble the walls and mount the doors, which was very simply to do. Once it was all put together, it is very sturdy and looks great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Z Epps

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Great storage unit that works well in my kitchen and stores quite a bit. It took awhile to put together but I've been pleasantly surprised by the quality and storage capacity. I purchased this with a $50 discount and free shipping was made it very worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: I Love This!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together, though my son-in-law did it for us, and just what I needed for my kitchen. I needed the extra space for storage, and it does a great job, as well as looking beautiful in my white kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: looks great and good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: looks great and good quality for price. Only problem - the top doors do not align properly. may have to rework hinges.
customer_reviews.author: LindaBee

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Not too deep, and that’s fine. Looks awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Shew

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet was relatively easy to assemble and the finished cabinet looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was relatively easy to assemble and the finished cabinet looks nice. Good quality product that was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pantry for temporary kitchen storage until I remodel, but it will look great in any room once that is complete.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Looks great. Plenty of space. Perfect for serving as a kitchen pantry.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cabinet =)
customer_reviews.text: I really need more cabinet space and this cabinet is functional and looks great
customer_reviews.author: booky

customer_reviews.title: Cherry storage cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Total hardwood construction and not difficult to put together, and it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wood Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to be much harder to assemble. Really impressed with quality and with how it was packaged.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid wood, well built cabinet. I'm considering buying a second one. Would recomment this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but shorter than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Easy to put together. Sturdy. Shorter than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: nelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase! The quality is superb
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! The quality is superb, a great addition to the kitchen lucks of a pantry. Attention to assembly, it is not one persons' work.
customer_reviews.author: Panos

customer_reviews.title: nice looking piece, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Upper set of doors didn't line up perfect, came with broken piece but co. Sent replacement right away no questions asked. Received a few compliments great for it is/ cost.
customer_reviews.author: poyuuski

customer_reviews.title: ... this to be our food pantry and it is great! It holds enough and it's pretty
customer_reviews.text: Got this to be our food pantry and it is great! It holds enough and it's pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Off white cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sturdy cabinet. Took my husband about 90 minutes to assemble. Color is off white. I am using it in our pool bath for beach towels.
customer_reviews.author: judbun

customer_reviews.title: Tall pantry perfect addition to home
customer_reviews.text: Got this pantry today and excitedly put it together. The piece looked nice and I was not disappointed. Sturdy, well made, nothing cheap. Packed well and clean, clearly marked and easy to build. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This is not white
customer_reviews.text: This is not white!!! I put it together which took over an hour and set it up only to find out it is far from white, it’s more ivory. What am I suppose to do take it all apart & try to put it back in the box to ship??
customer_reviews.author: Cori Scharfenberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and easy to assemble. Just what we needed for storage in a smaller kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted and looks good too!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, looks great, solid piece. Left doors open for a few days to air out. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Groupie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but worked out perfectly and for the best. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble. Missing screws and came with wrong door and the wood had scratches and knicks. I had to reorder to get the correct door and then return the second purchase. Pantry is spacious and looks nice but would never order from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: annette cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: We are ver pleased! Cabinet looks beautiful and was easy to assemble. We use it for a linen cabinet in our open hall. Nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as expected. Looks great, I like the adjustable shelves; it's a quality cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: XcluYou

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy to put together, with plenty of room. It can pass for dark wood or black. Has adjustable legs to balance on an uneven floor.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice... not as heavy as I would like it, so the doors seem to be a bit flimsy. overall, nice cabinet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EarnestMa'am

product_meta.title: Americana White Pantry by Home Styles
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Americana pantry storage cabinet is made of hardwood solids and engineered wood. Comes with multi step white finish. Pastoral design elements are apparent in the strong lines of the recessed panel doors as well as in the prominent base and top moldings. Ample storage can be found in both storage cabinets, each with a fixed shelf and two adjustable shelves. Easy to assemble. Measures 30-inch width by 16-inch depth by 72-inch height.
feature_bullets: Made of hardwood solids and engineered wood
Pastoral design elements are apparent in the strong lines of the recessed panel doors as well as in the prominent base and top moldings
Comes with multi step white finish
Measures 30-inch width by 16-inch depth by 72-inch height
